video.title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Bitty Adventures
video.synopsis: Join Strawberry Shortcake and her berry best friends in the whimsical land of Berry Bitty City, where they learn about teamwork and decision-making.

episodes.synopsis: Orange adopts a pet. But will the responsibility of taking care of it be too much for her to handle?
episodes.title: Fish Out of Water

episodes.synopsis: Raspberry can't decide on a design for Strawberry's new dress, so Plum and the girls decide to help her in the best way they know how: their way!
episodes.title: A Stitch in Time

episodes.synopsis: When the prize violets Lemon is raising for the flower show start mysteriously disappearing, Lemon jumps to some wrong conclusions.
episodes.title: The Vanishing Violets

episodes.synopsis: Strawberry has her hands full when she agrees to baby-sit a young Berrykin who has magical powers.
episodes.title: Babysitter Blues

episodes.synopsis: Lemon orders a new high-tech machine to do salon services faster and then worries that she is no longer needed in the community.
episodes.title: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: A packaging mixup at the seed company results in Blueberry planting popcorn instead of daisies.
episodes.title: Pop Goes the Garden

episodes.synopsis: Strawberry fills in at the bumblebee post office and learns that sometimes even when you try your very best, things don't always turn out as planned.
episodes.title: The Berry Best You Can Bee

episodes.synopsis: Strawberry struggles with how to be the berry best hostess when she has the very worst houseguests.
episodes.title: Strawberry's House Pests

episodes.synopsis: Strawberry and her friends try to break a Berry Bitty world record to win a vacation for Berrykin Bloom.
episodes.title: Berry Bitty World Record

episodes.synopsis: Plum disregards Strawberry's rule to sign up for use of the café and is forced to reschedule a big dance recital.
episodes.title: Too Cool for Rules

episodes.synopsis: Berry Bitty City holds an election to see who will fill in as BerryFest Princess while Princess Berrykin is absent.
episodes.title: Berry Best BerryFest Princess

episodes.synopsis: When Strawberry finds herself in charge of the upcoming BerryFest parade, she hopes her gal pals can help.
episodes.title: Strawberry's Berry Big Parade

episodes.synopsis: As this year's BerryFest Princess, Strawberry must learn to be a leader.
episodes.title: The Berry Best Choice

episodes.synopsis: When there's a blackout in Berry Bitty City, Orange discovers she has a fear of what's in the dark: a Galumphalot.
episodes.title: Nothing to Fear But Berries Themselves

episodes.synopsis: Blueberry spends all her time emulating her literary detective hero and ignores her pals, until Strawberry gives her a "missing person" case to solve.
episodes.title: Where, Oh Where Has Our Blueberry Gone

episodes.synopsis: When the town's very formal Berry Bitty Buggy Derby is revived, Blueberry gets so obsessed with "manners" that she does more harm than good.
episodes.title: Manners Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: Chaos ensues when Raspberry finds a way to enlarge the Berrykins to the same size as Strawberry and her friends.
episodes.title: Trading Sizes

episodes.synopsis: Plum, determined to win a dance-off trophy, tries to get her friends and the Berrykins to dance just like a rival dance team.
episodes.title: Different Waltz for Different Faults

episodes.synopsis: When Blueberry gives a "secret" gift that's more what she wants than what the recipient wants, a hot potato of passing on the unwanted gift occurs.
episodes.title: Happy First Frost

episodes.synopsis: Raspberry is upset when she suspects her friends have copied her lantern design for a big festival until she learns the true meaning behind the event.
episodes.title: A Circle of Friends

episodes.synopsis: When the town needs a larger venue for its Glimmerberry Ball, Plum finds an ideal hollow tree for the occasion, but two chipmunks keep interfering.
episodes.title: The Glimmerberry Ball

episodes.synopsis: Lemon creates neon manicures that eventually the other girls come to dislike.
episodes.title: Nice as Nails

episodes.synopsis: When a popular new game makes its way to Berry Bitty City, Orange has to figure out a fair way for everyone to access public spaces.
episodes.title: How You Play the Game

episodes.synopsis: When Sadiebug and Kadiebug create a new club, Plum is suckered into doing their bidding, thinking that it's a "test" for good citizenship.
episodes.title: Good Citizens Club

episodes.synopsis: Lemon and Raspberry are forced to work together to design a daycare center and playground and eventually find a way to put their rivalry behind them.
episodes.title: Team for Two

episodes.synopsis: Strawberry pretends everything is OK when her pets don't return home but learns she can rely on her friends for comfort.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: Orange Blossom has too much of Berrykin Bloom's new Berry Bitty Fruits & Veggies in her store and tries to handle it all by herself.
episodes.title: The Berry Big Harvest

episodes.synopsis: Strawberry Shortcake's friends pitch in to help build a new bedroom atop her produce marketplace, but it comes out a little different than planned.
episodes.title: Room at the Top

episodes.synopsis: When Strawberry's friends surprise her by inviting superstar Cherry Jam to perform at the Marketplace opening, they get a surprise of their own.
episodes.title: Starlight, Star Bright

episodes.synopsis: Cherry Jam plans a big recital to showcase her new students, but Plum gets a bad case of stage fright and tries to delay the event.
episodes.title: Practice Makes Perfect

episodes.synopsis: When it's discovered that a talent scout will attend the first-ever Berry Bitty City talent show, Lemon decides she must perform without any help.
episodes.title: Top Talent

episodes.synopsis: Raspberry considers moving to Berry Big City when she's discovered by a talent scout who wants her to design a new line of Glitter fashions.
episodes.title: A Star is Fashioned

episodes.synopsis: When Blueberry overhears Strawberry talking about a beautiful tropical island, she tells all her friends that they're going on a big vacation.
episodes.title: No Blueberry is an Island

episodes.synopsis: The girls' perfect tropical vacation gets cancelled because of bad weather, so Orange decides to recreate the resort at home but gets too ambitious.
episodes.title: Where the Berry Breeze Blows

episodes.synopsis: TV host Mavis Maraschino cuts into the girls' vacation at their homemade resort when she arrives to do a segment on Cherry Jam.
episodes.title: The Berry Best Vacation

episodes.synopsis: When the girls must leave town to perform in Berry Big City, they train the Berrykins to keep the community running, but Orange is reluctant to leave.
episodes.title: On the Road

episodes.synopsis: After a short run of springlike weather, winter cold sets in and forces the town to decide whether or not to share the winter supplies with others.
episodes.title: The Berry Long Winter

episodes.synopsis: When Blueberry's invention of parasol-powered ice skates is a big hit, she gets to create her own musical commercial about them.
episodes.title: The Big Freeze

episodes.synopsis: Raspberry and Berrykin Bruce plan springtime events in the same venue, so Strawberry helps them come up with a compromise despite even more obstacles.
episodes.title: On Ice

episodes.synopsis: On his way to Berry Big City to open a home for stray dogs, Huckleberry Pie's petmobile gets stuck. He is rescued by Strawberry and her friends.
episodes.title: A Boy and His Dogs

episodes.synopsis: Blueberry entices Huckleberry to team up to write a story for an online mystery magazine, but she won't accept any of Huck's original ideas.
episodes.title: Partners in Crime

episodes.synopsis: When Huckleberry and Blueberry's story is rejected by a mystery magazine, Strawberry plans a dog show to raise funds for Huckleberry's pet shelter.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Disappearing Dog Show

episodes.synopsis: Plum's plan to direct a small, simple fairy tale play snowballs out of control when she hears of the same play being done in a big city theater.
episodes.title: Snowberry and Seven Berrykins

episodes.synopsis: Drafted by the girls to play Prince Berry Charming in a community play, Huck pushes aside his reluctance and tries to not disappoint them.
episodes.title: Berryella and Prince Berry Charming

episodes.synopsis: Blueberry and Huckleberry pitch their new play, an adaptation of the Berrykin Kids' favorite BerryFairyTale "The Littlest Berrykin," to their friends.
episodes.title: The Littlest Berrykin

episodes.synopsis: A problem in the sparkleberry juice system that powers the entire town results in a repair crew of Berrykins invading the town with jackhammers.
episodes.title: The Berry Big Relay Race

episodes.synopsis: A problem in the sparkleberry juice system keeps the girls from doing their work, which frustrates Cherry Jam, who's struggling to write a song.
episodes.title: The Berry Best Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Unable to sleep with the noise of an all-night construction crew trying to get the power turned back on, Strawberry and the girls go on a campout.
episodes.title: The Berry Scary Fun Adventure

episodes.synopsis: While building a new dog park, Huck finds the good luck charm that Cherry wrongly believes gives her the ability to sing difficult notes.
episodes.title: The Berry Lucky Day

episodes.synopsis: The girls plan an elegant afternoon tea party to inaugurate the town's new dog park, but their puppies refuse to enter, and no one can figure out why.
episodes.title: All Dogs Allowed!

episodes.synopsis: Blueberry invites Huck to attend Berry Bitty City's big masquerade ball in honor of their new dog park. A screwball comedy of errors ensues.
episodes.title: A Basketful of Blueberries

episodes.synopsis: The girls decide to each bake Berrykin Bloom the perfect cupcake, to be presented at a ceremony honoring him for his achievements in Berryculture.
episodes.title: The Berry Biggest, Berry Baddest Bakeoff
